publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-715.2 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Fisheries 2004-As an amendment to motion (S2M-715) in the name of Ross Finnie, leave out from "supports" to end and insert "calls upon the Scottish Executive to implement an immediate ban on industrial fishing and to reinstate the full fishing rights for our deep water fleet; calls for national control of our fishing grounds and local management of our fisheries, the recognition and protection of the Scottish catch as a quality product, a review of the science of fish management and an immediate investigation into the possible establishment of a "haddock box" and closed areas of cod "hot spots", and calls on the Executive to fight for an immediate review of the concordat between Her Majesty's Government and the Executive on fisheries and the return of the fishing boundary to the line of Berwick-upon-Tweed."
